attributes.action: Temporarily waive all visa requirements for Ukrainians travelling to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Without a visa there is no safe and legal route for Ukrainians fleeing the conflict to travel to the UK and claim asylum.

Follow all other European countries and temporarily waive visa requirements.
attributes.background:
The UK is the only European country still imposing visa requirements on Ukrainians escaping the conflict.

Temporarily lift all visa restrictions for Ukrainians travelling to the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
